episodes.title: Les Wexner’s Attorney Whispers ‘I Will F***ing Kill You’ During Epstein Deposition
episodes.description:
A lawyer for billionaire Les Wexner apparently had enough of the businessman’s long-winded answers during a deposition before House Oversight Committee investigators earlier this week — and was caught on a hot mic bluntly telling him to keep his answers to questions about his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein short and sweet. “I will f–king kill you if you answer another question with more than five words, OK?” attorney Michael Levy whispered to Wexner about four and a half hours into the former Victoria’s Secret owner’s deposition in the congressional Epstein probe. 

#victoriasecret #epsteinfiles #epsteininvestigation #deposition

episodes.title: New Mexico DOJ Probes Claim of Bodies Buried Near Epstein Ranch
episodes.description:
State legislators in New Mexico launched an investigation Tuesday into past activity at a secluded desert ranch where financier and sex offender Jeffrey Epstein once entertained guests, and whether local authorities looked the other way.

A bipartisan, four-member panel of state House representatives are investigating allegations that the ranch may have facilitated sexual abuse and sex trafficking. New Mexico lawmakers also say they want to know why Epstein was not registered as a sex offender after pleading guilty in 2008 to soliciting prostitution from an underage girl and whether there was corruption among public officials.

#newmexico #jeffreyepstein #investigations

episodes.title: Everything We Know About Ex-Prince Andrew’s Arrest in Epstein Bombshell
episodes.description:
The disgraced royal was arrested on his 66th birthday at his Sandringham estate on suspicion of misconduct in public office tied to Jeffrey Epstein. Police swooped in with unmarked cars as investigators probe whether he shared confidential trade documents — and he now faces a possible life sentence if convicted.

#princeandrew #jeffreyepstein

episodes.title: Ex-Prince Andrew Arrested on Birthday in Epstein Scandal Bombshell
episodes.description:
Disgraced ex-Prince Andrew was arrested Thursday on suspicion of misconduct in public office for allegedly forwarding confidential trade documents to pedophile pal Jeffrey Epstein.

At least six unmarked police cars and around eight plain-clothed officers swooped on the king’s brother’s Sandringham Estate in eastern England early Thursday — Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor’s 66th birthday.

If convicted on the misconduct charge, the former prince faces a maximum sentence of life in prison.

Read more at https://nypost.com/2026/02/19/world-news/ex-prince-andrew-mountbatten-arrested-for-misconduct-in-public-office-over-his-links-to-jeffrey-epstein/

episodes.title: Epstein’s Zorro Ranch Will be Fully Investigated
episodes.description:
On Monday, February 16, lawmakers in New Mexico passed legislation on a full investigation into what went down on Jeffrey Epstein’s Zorro Ranch. The 7,600-acre property is where Epstein is accused of trafficking and sexually assaulting women and girls. 

#jeffreyepstein #epsteinfiles #ranch #newmexico #traffickingawareness

episodes.title: Bondi Tells Congress Epstein File Release is Complete
episodes.description:
The FBI confirmed that DNA was found on a glove that resembles the one worn by the masked man seen on Nancy Guthrie’s doorbell camera. Is this the big break everyone has been waiting for? Attorney General Pam Bondi says all the Epstein files have now been released but her letter to Congress has critics on both sides of the aisle upset.

Read more at https://nypost.com/video/dna-found-on-gloves-near-guthries-home-bondi-tells-congress-epstein-file-release-is-complete/

episodes.title: Watch Ghislaine Maxwell Plead the Fifth During Her Deposition
episodes.description:
Convicted sex trafficker Ghislaine Maxwell told Congress on Monday she’ll clear both President Trump and former President Bill Clinton in the Jeffrey Epstein scandal – once she’s sprung from prison. 

Maxwell, 64, opted to invoke her Fifth Amendment right against self-incrimination during a deposition before the powerful House Oversight Committee when she appeared virtually from a federal prison camp. She answered no questions about Epstein’s sick sex acts with underage girls and the powerful men who were complicit in his crimes.

#ghislainemaxwell #deposition #houseoversight

episodes.title: Why Ghislaine Maxwell ‘Will Never Tell the Truth’: Epstein Survivor's Attorney
episodes.description:
Attorney Sigrid McCawley gave her thoughts on Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell, who refused to answer questions at a deposition before the U.S. House's Committee on Oversight and Government Reform on Monday, according to lawmakers.

Maxwell, who was found guilty in 2021 for her role in helping Epstein sexually abuse teenage girls and is currently serving a 20-year prison sentence, invoked her Fifth Amendment privilege against self-incrimination and declined to answer questions, lawmakers said after the deposition.

episodes.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Refuses to Answer Questions During House Deposition
episodes.description:
Convicted sex trafficker Ghislaine Maxwell invoked her Fifth Amendment right against self-incrimination during a deposition before the powerful House Oversight Committee on Monday as it investigates her links to the deceased pedophile Jeffrey Epstein.

Maxwell, 64, answered no questions while appearing virtually from the federal prison camp in Texas, where she is serving a 20-year prison sentence for sex trafficking, conspiracy, and other crimes committed while in the service of Epstein, a source familiar with her testimony told The Post.

#ghislainemaxwell #houseoversightcommittee #fifthamendment

episodes.description:
First Lady Melania Trump dismissed speculation that she was using an official White House event to promote her recently released documentary, saying the meeting was held to welcome and thank freed American-Israeli hostage Keith Siegel and his wife, Aviva Siegel.

episodes.title: Comer BLASTS Clinton for Refusing to Testify on Epstein
episodes.description:
The GOP House Oversight Committee held a brief press conference after President Clinton did not show up to give testimony in Congress in regards to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. Chairman James Comer, a representative from Kentucky, is now threatening contempt of Congress against the former president.

episodes.title: DOJ Uncovers a Million More Potential Epstein Documents
episodes.description:
The Justice Department said Wednesday that more than 1 million more files “potentially related to” late pedophile Jeffrey Epstein have been found by the Manhattan US attorney’s office — and that it “may take a few more weeks” to comply with the law mandating their release.

“The US Attorney for the Southern District of New York and the FBI have informed the Department of Justice that they have uncovered over a million more documents potentially related to the Jeffrey Epstein case,” the department said in a statement.

#epsteinfiles #departmentofjustice #jeffreyepstein

episodes.title: Trump Decries the Release of Embarrassing Pics of Bill Clinton With Epstein
episodes.description:
President Trump revealed that he does like the Justice Department’s release of embarrassing photos of a half-naked Bill Clinton swimming with late sex predator Jeffrey Epstein’s madam, Ghislaine Maxwell.

“No, I don’t like the pictures of Bill Clinton being shown,” he told reporters Sunday. “I don’t like the pictures of other people being shown. I think it’s a terrible thing.”
#donaldtrump #billclinton #epsteinfiles

episodes.title: Trump Tells Female Reporter ‘Quiet, Piggy’ After Being Asked About Epstein Files
episodes.description:
President Trump sparked backlash after telling Bloomberg reporter Catherine Lucey to be “quiet, piggy” aboard Air Force One when she pressed him on why he opposed releasing the remaining Epstein files. The moment comes as the House prepares to vote on whether to release additional Epstein documents — a move Trump now says he supports, insisting he has “nothing to hide.”

#donaldtrump #epsteinfiles #piggy 

Read more at https://nypost.com/2025/11/17/media/trump-blasts-reporter-who-interrupted-him-you-are-the-worst/

episodes.title: Inside the Zizian cult linked to a trail of bodies across the US
episodes.description:
Here's everything you need to know about the mysterious alleged Zizian cult, following the arrest of its accused leader, Jack LaSota, aka "Ziz." The transgender and vegan radical group is connected to six deaths, including a Border Patrol agent, from 2022 to 2024, across three states: California, Pennsylvania and Vermont. Learn about the Zizians' origins, their esoteric beliefs, and how members allegedly turned violent in this video deep-dive. “They talk as if they really believe they have supernatural powers and they believe movies like ‘The Matrix’ are real and they can manipulate reality,” an investigator familiar with the Zizians told The Post.

#zizian #cult #crime #murder
